MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 12-JAN-2021 10:42.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the EH10 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Greenbank Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.35am. Our engineers have arrived Greenbank Drive substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.22am on Tuesday 12th January 2021
